pullrequest.title: Support joint creation between nested model links in model editor

content.raw:
1. Insert some links and nested models and make a joint between links

1. Open the joint inspector

1. Change the child to another link, the visual moves

1. Change the child to a nested model, the visual moves

1. Change back to another link - the visual stays in the nested model
content.html:
1. Insert some links and nested models and make a joint between links

  2. Open the joint inspector

  3. Change the child to another link, the visual moves

  4. Change the child to a nested model, the visual moves

  5. Change back to another link - the visual stays in the nested model
